page.title: 08MOULSECOOMB COMMENTS
page.content: Where the Cubs meet used to be the farm barn.Every Wednesday at 6.30.we go to Cubs and 8.00 we go home.The wall beside our hut is made of flint. The field which the animals were put in, used to have fencing around.The wall is very long it also is made of flint . They are both very old and the barn has smashed windows & the roof is in a bad way . Kerry Hayes: Aged 8 During the Second World War childen used to carry a satchel with gas masks in. In an air raid they had air raid shelters;they used to have to walk along the playground to get to them. We have found some air raid shelters around the school but they are blocked up now but you can still see the entrance to them. John Brazil:Aged 8
